blogPost.excerpt: Just a curated list of the best games to play on your next video call Built during another lockdown in the UK, hopefully these games get you through your next awkward work social as they have for us... By https://shoreditchdesignstudio.com/, illustrations by https://craftwork.design/

blogPost.title: Zoom Games - Curated and filterable list of games to try on video calls
blogPost.author: Andrew Burton

localize.description: 只是一个最好的游戏，在你的下一个视频通话的策划列表 建立在另一个锁定在英国，希望这些游戏让你通过你的下一个尴尬的工作社交，因为他们已经为我们......。作者：https://shoreditchdesignstudio.com/，插图：https://craftwork.design/
localize.tagline: 策划并可过滤的游戏列表，可在视频通话中尝试。

localize.description: 只是一個最好的遊戲，在你的下一個視頻通話的策劃列表 建立在另一個鎖定在英國，希望這些遊戲讓你通過你的下一個尷尬的工作社交，因爲他們已經爲我們......。作者：https://shoreditchdesignstudio.com/，插圖：https://craftwork.design/
localize.tagline: 策劃並可過濾的遊戲列表，可在視頻通話中嘗試。

previous.excerpt: Card Curator is an app to help young professionals maximize their earnings from everyday spending and travel for free. Get personalized recommendations to help you automatically earn 5-10% or more on all your spending.
previous.title: Card Curator - Win credit card rewards, points, and miles game

localize.description: 卡咖是一款帮助年轻职业人士在日常消费中实现收益最大化的应用，免费旅游。获得个性化推荐，帮你自动赚取所有消费的5%-10%甚至更多。
localize.tagline: 赢取信用卡奖励、积分和里程游戏

localize.description: 卡咖是一款幫助年輕職業人士在日常消費中實現收益最大化的應用，免費旅遊。獲得個性化推薦，幫你自動賺取所有消費的5%-10%甚至更多。
localize.tagline: 贏取信用卡獎勵、積分和里程遊戲

next.excerpt: Collect Colossal Content. Hypto.io takes NFT collection beyond the digital art space and allows its users to collect HUGE moments in internet history from an exclusive network of creators and influencers.
next.title: Hypto - Own viral moments in internet history through NFT blockchain

localize.description: 收集巨大的内容。Hypto.io将NFT收藏带出了数字艺术领域，让用户从专属的创作者和影响者网络中收集互联网历史上的巨大时刻。
localize.tagline: 通过NFT区块链，拥有互联网历史上的病毒时刻。

localize.description: 收集巨大的內容。Hypto.io將NFT收藏帶出了數字藝術領域，讓用戶從專屬的創作者和影響者網絡中收集互聯網歷史上的巨大時刻。
localize.tagline: 通過NFT區塊鏈，擁有互聯網歷史上的病毒時刻。
